actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

actions.text: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-72.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to authorize a feasibility study for the preservation of the Loess Hills in western Iowa.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a feasibility study to determine what measures may be taken to preserve the Loess Hills in western Iowa. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a feasibility study for the preservation of the Loess Hills in western Iowa.
